Name: Broken Mossed Stone
Desc: Stones of this sort may be found often throughout the rainforests of Sumeru, their broken appearance the result of years of erosion due to humidity and the footsteps of many beasts. Green moss grows on them, making them quite slippery, to which the Forest Ranger recommendation to most has been to avoid stepping on them at all to avoid falling and injuring oneself. However, some strict mercenaries are in the habit of training their sense of balance with the aid of weights and these stones...
